diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $BC$ is $y$ units.
The length of the line $BE$ is $x$ units.
The length of the line $BA$ is $5sqrt{2}$ units.
Point $A$ lies on the line connecting $D$ and $E$.
The line $BC$ is perpendicular to the line $CD$.
The line $BC$ is perpendicular to the line $BE$.
The line $AC$ is perpendicular to the line $AB$.
The line $CD$ is perpendicular to the line $AD$.
The line $BE$ is perpendicular to the line $AE$.
The length of the line $AC$ is equal to the length of the line $AB$.
